name: Something Happened in Phinis Manor
description:
Discover the secrets of this family as you dig through their trash. Learn their names, hobbies, and dark past times as you put together what went down at the Phinis Manor.

Features:

A journal to write down your thoughts, a collection system to remember the story, and a whole lot of trash to rifle through. 

(This game autosaves when you continue through to the next night. The details of where your files are stored and a button to delete them are displayed on the main menu)
